header.title: How we can help you
header.subtitle: From immigration to South Africa to emigration, visa planning and everyday support, we structure our services to guide you step by step.

grid.title: Explore our main service areas
grid.subtitle: Choose the direction that best matches your current goals. If you are not sure where to start, our consultants can help you choose the right route.

immigration.title: Immigration to South Africa
immigration.body: End-to-end support with South African visa routes, temporary and permanent residence, and planning your relocation.

emigration.title: Emigration & working abroad
emigration.body: Guidance for those leaving South Africa to live, work or study in other countries, including tourist, training and work options.

visaTypes.title: Types of visas
visaTypes.body: An overview of work, study, business, family and long-term visitor visas and who can qualify for each.

additionalSupport.title: Additional support services
additionalSupport.body: Education guidance, housing and neighbourhood orientation, banking and everyday questions to help you settle calmly.
